00044     def test_ValidAccount(self):
00045         """
00046         Checks whether account number entered is valid.
00047         """
00048         account_number= '12345678'
00049         newAccount = Account.objects.create(account_number= '12345678', balance= '5000', name='sakshi', number_of_chequebooks='1')
00050         
00051         c = Client()
00052         response = c.post('/cheques/employeeLogin/e_searchAccount/',{'account_number':'12345678'})
00053         self.assertEqual(response.status_code,200)
00054 
00055     def test_invalid_accountnumber(self):
00056         
00057         resp = self.client.post('/cheques/employeeLogin/e_searchAccount/',{'account_number':'1234321'})
00058         self.assertEqual(resp.status_code, 200)
00059         
00060         self.assertEqual(resp.context['error_message'], "Invalid Account Number")

00063     def test_ChequePayment(self):
00064        
00065         first_cheque_number= 100477
00066         acc_n=30446461991
00067         newAccount = Account.objects.create(account_number= '30446461991', account_type='savings', balance= Decimal("5000.00"), name='chandra', number_of_chequebooks=1)
00068         newChequeBook = ChequeBook.objects.create(account_number=newAccount, size=20, issue_date= '2010-10-10', first_cheque_number= first_cheque_number)
00069         c = Client()
00070         response = c.post('/cheques/employeeMenu/e_chequePayment/?account_number=30446461991',{'cheque_number':first_cheque_number, 'amount':Decimal("1000.00"), 'cheque_date':'2011-11-21', 'payee_name':'xyz'})
00071         for num in Cheque.objects.all():
00072                 a_num=num.cheque_number
00073                 if first_cheque_number==a_num:
00074                         cheque_status=num.status
00075         self.assertEqual(cheque_status,'processed')       
00076         self.assertEqual(response.status_code,200)
00077         
00078     def test_invalid_Chequenumber_payment(self):
00079 
00080         first_cheque_number= 100477
00081         acc_n=30446461991
00082         newAccount = Account.objects.create(account_number= '30446461991', account_type='savings', balance= Decimal("5000.00"), name='chandra', number_of_chequebooks=1)
00083         newChequeBook = ChequeBook.objects.create(account_number=newAccount, size=20, issue_date= '2010-10-10', first_cheque_number= first_cheque_number)
00084         c = Client()
00085         response = c.post('/cheques/employeeMenu/e_chequePayment/?account_number=30446461991',{'cheque_number':11212122, 'amount':Decimal("1000.00"), 'cheque_date':'2011-11-21', 'payee_name':'xyz'})
00086         self.assertEqual(response.context['message'], "Invalid cheque number")
00087         self.assertEqual(response.status_code,200)

00089     def test_insufficient_balance_payment(self):
00090 
00091         first_cheque_number= 100477
00092         acc_n=30446461991
00093         newAccount = Account.objects.create(account_number= '30446461991', account_type='savings', balance= Decimal("5000.00"), name='chandra', number_of_chequebooks=1)
00094         newChequeBook = ChequeBook.objects.create(account_number=newAccount, size=20, issue_date= '2010-10-10', first_cheque_number= first_cheque_number)
00095         c = Client()
00096         response = c.post('/cheques/employeeMenu/e_chequePayment/?account_number=30446461991',{'cheque_number':first_cheque_number, 'amount':Decimal("100000000000.00"), 'cheque_date':'2011-11-21', 'payee_name':'xyz'})
00097         self.assertEqual(response.context['message'], "Cheque bounced due to insufficient balance")
00098         self.assertEqual(response.status_code,200)

00104         newAccount = Account.objects.create(account_number= '30446461991', account_type='savings', balance= Decimal("5000.00"), name='chandra', number_of_chequebooks=1)

00107         response = c.post('/cheques/employeeMenu/e_chequePayment/?account_number=30446461991',{'cheque_number':first_cheque_number, 'amount':Decimal("1000.00"), 'cheque_date':'2010-11-21', 'payee_name':'xyz'})
00108         self.assertEqual(response.context['message'], "Cheque bounced due to expired date")

00111     def test_ChequeCancellation(self):
00112 
00113         from cheques.views import ChequeCancellationForm
00114        
00115         first_cheque_number= 111113
00116         newAccount = Account.objects.create(account_number= '30446461991', balance= 5000, name='sakshi', number_of_chequebooks=1)
00117         newChequeBook = ChequeBook.objects.create(account_number=newAccount, size=20, issue_date= '2011-11-11', first_cheque_number= first_cheque_number)
00118         cheque_number= 111113
00119         c = Client()
00120         response = c.post('/cheques/employeeMenu/e_chequeCancellation/?account_number=30446461991',{'cheque_number':cheque_number})
00121         for num in Cheque.objects.all():
00122                 a_num=num.cheque_number
00123                 if cheque_number==a_num:
00124                         cheque_status=num.status
00125         
00126         self.assertEqual(cheque_status,'cancelled')
00127         self.assertEqual(response.status_code,200)
00128

00142     def test_IssueChequeBook(self):
00143         account_number='30446461991'
00144         newAccount = Account.objects.create(account_number= '30446461991', balance= 5000, name='sakshi', number_of_chequebooks=0)
00145         first_cheque_number=111111
00146         c = Client()
00147         
00148         response = c.post('/cheques/employeeMenu/e_issueChequeBook/?account_number=30446461991',{'size': 20})
00149         cb_size=0
00150         for num in ChequeBook.objects.all():
00151                 a_num=num.account_number_id
00152                 if account_number=='30446461991':
00153                         cb_size=num.size
00154         
00155         self.assertEqual(response.status_code,200)
